reasoning: Reporting incidence based on birth prevalence of 1 in 3,000 live births. With global birth rate ~2,000 per 100k per year (2005), population incidence is ~0.67 per 100k person-years. Well-documented genetic disorder.
source: Lammert M et al. (2005). Prevalence of neurofibromatosis 1 in German children at elementary school enrollment. Arch Dermatol. 141(1):71-74
